name: Mannequins (BadGamesStudyo)
description:
In this short horror game you - tourist.And you can't find you car in the forest.But mannequin 003 catch you and you getting up in strange large place,there are a lot of mannequins,but five of them alive.Can you escape?

Controls:

Move - W,A,S,D.

Turn on/off flashlight - F.

Open/close door - E.
